mapper.select: select * from book order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into book(title, price, author, page) values(#{title} , #{price}, #{author}, 500)
insert into bible(customer_id, bible_word, bible_repent, bible_things,bible_implement) values(#{customer_id} , #{bible_word}, #{bible_repent}, #{bible_things},#{bible_implement})
